xt:extension.xt:author: Syncro Soft
xt:extension.xt:name: DuplicateLine

div.p: This plugin duplicates the current line.
After installing the plugin it can be accessed through the editor's contextual menu by choosing Plugins->Duplicate Line Up/Duplicate Line Down.
